credit_line: Gift of Susan W. Paine in honor of Stephen D. Paine, Class of 1954
title: Sweet Piercings
description: This work displays Stiegelmeyer's interest in surreal subject matter and the use of modernist and folk imagery within much of his work.
inscriptions: verso u.c., collection label: [Paine]; verso l.r. in ink: Norman Stiegelmeyer/ "Sweet Piercings"/ Jan. 1969; verso l.c., frame label: [Dimitroff's picture frames]
